name: Time Surge 2: Clean Up Time
description:
Seven years of packages being delivered just seconds after they were ordered thanks to the time traveling Starship Time Surge… and no ChronoCore accidents, that is until now.

In Time Surge 2, you’ll find yourself cleaning up time, solving puzzles, doing it again, and again, and again, and again. You might think to get out of this you’re gonna need a bigger mop, but in fact the very one you have can help you out of being stuck in a time loop.

Controls
  • See bottom right of game screen ^_^
Pro-Tips
  • Touching Chronotoxin will cause time to loop, resetting the game.
  • If you don’t want to wait for the Chronotoxin to get you, you can hold down the ‘R’ key to reset early.
  • You can use your Mop to gather ChronoCore fluid, and put it on other things to unstuck them in time.
  • Unstuck objects will not reset with the rest of the game.
  • If you make a mistake, you can undo actions with the ‘Q’ key.
